what-we-do: Get to know what we do
what-we-do-text: Godfather ipsum dolor sit amet. You talk about vengeance. Is vengeance going to bring your son back to you? Or my boy to me? Michael, you never told me you knew Johnny Fontane! That's my family Kay, that's not me. My father is no different than any powerful man, any man with power, like a president or senator. I'm gonna make him an offer he can't refuse. What's the matter with you, huh? What am I going to do? Am I going to make that baby an orphan before he's born? Do me this favor. I won't forget it. Ask your friends in the neighborhood about me. They'll tell you I know how to return a favor. I don't trust a doctor who can hardly speak English. Just when I thought I was out... they pull me back in.
